stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements explains why the plaque demonstrates continuity with Benin tradition?

features.html: Image © The Metropolitan Museum of Art/Image source © Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: It shows the oba charging into battle on a horse.
It depicts the oba in a composite view to suggest his many roles.
It is part of a series that document the history of the obas.
It is believed to be the first of the plaques that depicted an oba.
